column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Sometimes after a long , hard , stressful day at the office , the best thing to do when you get home is to take a nice , hot , relaxing bubble bath !
#text=That is exactly what I did after coming home on Monday afternoon .
#text=I decided I would make it as relaxing as possible and pretend that I was at a spa .
#text=I went up to the bathroom and started to draw the warm water into the tub .
#text=While that was filling up I then went down to the kitchen and grabbed a bottle of wine and a glass and took it upstairs to sip as I soaked .
#text=To complete my ultimate relaxation bath night I grabbed my blue tooth speaker and set it up to play some relaxing music while I was in the tub .
#text=I then added some bubble bath and got in .
#text=First I washed my hair and then my body and then it was time to relax and soak until my skin started to look like a raisin .
